name: Loopbot
description:
Ludum Dare 47 entry by C-man and J-dog.

This was our first game-jam competition entry, so a bit short and rough. But the potential for a very fun game is there! :))

Created in UE4, with Paper2D. Most of the work by C-man, most of the binned features by J-dog.

Twitch vods of development.

If the audio desyncs/sucks, we need to refactor to use time-synth (if things are off please let us know, in-case we do turn it into a fullgame!)

Assets:

Thank you Mr Kenny https://www.kenney.nl/assets

Music sources:

Drum samples: https://soundcloud.com/datadrive

Bass Synth Samples:

https://www.noiiz.com/sounds/packs/267
&
https://soundpacks.com/free-sound-packs/future-synthwave-sample-pack/

Others created using the incredibly awesome Sonic-Pi
